Class CheckWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CheckWriter

  • public class CheckWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    1.0 Handles behaviors for the CheckWriter
    Author:
    David Hausken

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float amount
      Float representing the amount inputted by the user.
      private float decimal
      The decimal of the amount after being multiplied by 100, used for the fraction.
      private int wholeNumber
      Int representing the amount with the decimal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckWriter

        public CheckWriter(float amount)
        Constructor for the check writer. Due to an unknown bug, it adjusts the decimal if it's odd.
        Parameters:
        amount - Specified amount of money to be converted into an appropriate check translation.

    • Method Detail

        public java.lang.String moneyToWords()
        Converts the amount defined in the constructor and converts it to check form.
        Returns:
        String representing the value of the money in check form.
